ubirch.createNumberMessage: Create a number message as a signed packet to send to the server. Encodes key/value as a json message.
ubirch.createStringMessage: Send a string to the backend server. Encodes key/value as a json message.
ubirch.setSignKey: Set secret key to sign messages as a hex encoded string.
ubirch.showDeviceInfo:
Show Calliope mini device id. It is used when encoding messages to identify
the device.
ubirch.stringToHex: Helper function to convert a string into a hex representation.
